reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

title.narrative: Sharing Lithuanian experience for the successful implementation of the EU - Ukraine Association Agreement

description.narrative: The project aims to share the experience of Lithuania and to assist Ukrainian government authorities in the creation of an efficient system of EU affairs and reform coordination for successfull implementation of the EU – Ukraine Association Agreement (AA), with particular emphasis on the necessary economic reforms. Project activities will focus on technical assistance and high-level consultations of Lithuanian experts to Ukrainian institutions. During the project implementation Lithuanian long-term expert will work in Ukraine and will provide advice and technical assistance on the creation of efficient system of EU affairs and reform coordination and implementation of EU – Ukraine Association Agreement (including Deep and comprehensive free trade area (DCFTA)) and necessary economic reforms. According to the needs of Ukrainian institutions the long-term expert will initiate and coordinate short-term consultations of Lithuanian experts who will provide advice on general and sectoral issues of AA and DCFTA implementation. Development Cooperation Policy Guidelines of the Republic of Lithuania for 2014-2016 indicate that bilateral development assistance to the Eastern Partnership countries shall focus on strengthening the administrative and institutional capacities in the frameworkof European integration.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
